comment._content: Gen. Ives fought in the Civil War. This link has a picture from that time: www.picturehistory.com/product/id/16569 He was also president of the New York Stock Exchange & the Northern Pacific Railroad: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brayton_C._Ives
